mapper.update:
UPDATE `simple_application_object` SET
`process_name` = #{set.processName},
`process_def_id` = #{set.processDefId},
`process_inst_id` = #{set.processInstId},
`task_id` = #{set.taskId},
`task_name` = #{set.taskName},
`assignee_id` = #{set.assigneeId},
`assignee_name` = #{set.assigneeName},
`user_id` = #{set.userId},
`user_name` = #{set.userName},
`applier_user_id` = #{set.applierUserId},
`applier_user_name` = #{set.applierUserName},
`apply_time` = #{set.applyTime},
`form_name` = #{set.formName},
`form_id` = #{set.formId},
`simple_reason` = #{set.simpleReason},
`link` = #{set.link},
`auditor_comment` = #{set.auditorComment},
`variables` = #{set.variables},
`process_inst_title` = #{set.processInstTitle},
`tbd5` = #{set.tbd5},
`mobile_link` = #{set.mobileLink},
`form_data_url` = #{set.formDataUrl},
`form_data` = #{set.formData},
`simple_application_object_id` in
#{item} and
`simple_application_object_id` >= #{where.simpleApplicationObjectIdSt} and
`simple_application_object_id` <= #{where.simpleApplicationObjectIdEd} and
`process_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Process_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Process_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`process_def_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Process_def_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Process_def_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`process_inst_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Process_inst_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Process_inst_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`task_id` in
#{item} and
(
`Task_id` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Task_id` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`task_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Task_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Task_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`assignee_id` in
#{item} and
`assignee_id` >= #{where.assigneeIdSt} and
`assignee_id` <= #{where.assigneeIdEd} and
`assignee_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Assignee_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Assignee_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`user_id` in
#{item} and
`user_id` >= #{where.userIdSt} and
`user_id` <= #{where.userIdEd} and
`user_name` in
#{item} and
(
`User_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`User_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`applier_user_id` in
#{item} and
`applier_user_id` >= #{where.applierUserIdSt} and
`applier_user_id` <= #{where.applierUserIdEd} and
`applier_user_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Applier_user_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Applier_user_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`apply_time` in
#{item} and
`apply_time` >= #{where.applyTimeSt} and
`apply_time` <= #{where.applyTimeEd} and
`form_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Form_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Form_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`form_id` in
#{item} and
`form_id` >= #{where.formIdSt} and
`form_id` <= #{where.formIdEd} and
`simple_reason` in
#{item} and
(
`Simple_reason` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Simple_reason` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`link` in
#{item} and
(
`Link` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Link` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`auditor_comment` in
#{item} and
(
`Auditor_comment` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and

) and
